p: Omar Said, Iyad Khamaysi, and Stephen Fulder performed the double-blind, randomized, and controlled efficacy study. Abdalsalam Kmail, Basheer AboFarekh, Jamila Daraghmeh, and Riyad Amin performed the in vitro studies and sebum production experiments. Bashar Saad and Omar were responsible for planning the study and are the main writers of the manuscript, and this was done in consultation with all authors.
